cause.description:
Breathmint has been terrorizing our world for centuries, and it is time to put an end to this threat. For more information on the threat and how you can help bring an end to the terror, call 314-488-4490 or 314-941-6956.
1. Breathmint is a danger to all.
2. She won the Alamo for the Mexicans.
3. She is a genius in the tactics of chemical warfare.
4. She is hard to bring down... we need your help.
cause.mission: eliminate the threat that is the foul fumes of Breathmint.
cause.name: Breathmint Awareness
